dc.title: NOAA - National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration
dc.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) is a federal agency focused on the condition of the oceans and the atmosphere. It plays several distinct roles within the Department of Commerce.
dc.subject: coastal and marine ecosystems
fisheries
climate
data and forecasts for weather and water cycle events
